body_html:
Not every contrib cc_library() rule. Some modules under tensorflow/contrib is part of _pywrap_tensorflow_internal.so, and we need to set is_external=False in these dirs.

Another thing: we may disable --config=monolithic on windows. So every kernel is external to the framework shared library. It would be eaiser for us to set CFLAGS correctly.
body_text:
Not every contrib cc_library() rule. Some modules under tensorflow/contrib is part of _pywrap_tensorflow_internal.so, and we need to set is_external=False in these dirs.
Another thing: we may disable --config=monolithic on windows. So every kernel is external to the framework shared library. It would be eaiser for us to set CFLAGS correctly.
body:
Not every contrib cc_library() rule. Some modules under tensorflow/contrib is part of _pywrap_tensorflow_internal.so, and we need to set is_external=False in these dirs. 

Another thing: we may disable --config=monolithic on windows. So every kernel is external to the framework shared library. It would be eaiser for us to set CFLAGS correctly.
